relation: 1) No, I've had faith for as long as I can remember.
2) No, I came to faith through a gradual process.
3) Yes, at one specific moment in the last 5 years.
4) Yes, at one specific moment more than 5 years ago.
5) Yes, a number of specific moments of commitment or re-commitment
